// AzelaikCiltBakimSerum.js import React from "react"; import { SRLWrapper } from "simple-react-lightbox"; import { t } from "./path-to-your-i18n-file"; // i18n dosyanızın yolunu ekleyin function AzelaikCiltBakimSerum() { return ( <>
  • {t("home")}
  • {t("ourProducts")}

{t("azelaicSerumTitle")}

{t("azelaicSerumTitle")} 30 ML

  • {t("benefits")} :
    • %10 Azelaik Asit solüsyon ile formüle edilmiştir. {t("reduceAppearance")} {t("smoothen")} {t("moisturize")}
  • {t("ingredients")} :
    • Aqua, Polyglycerin-6, Azelaic Acid, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Glycine, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Proline, Threonine, PCA, Alanine, Aspartic Acid, Isoleucine, Serine, Valine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium EDTA.
  • {t("usageAndWarnings")} :
    • {t("cleanSkinApply")} {t("externally")} {t("doNotUseIrritated")} {t("useSunscreen")} {t("patchTest")} {t("stopUseIfIrritation")} {t("consultDermatologist")} {t("avoidEyeContact")} {t("rinseWithWater")} {t("keepOutOfReach")}
  • {t("storageConditions")} :
    • {t("storeBetween")} +5°C {t("and")} +25°C.

  • {t("attention")} : {t("readUsageInstructions")}

{t("shareWithFriends")}

); } export default AzelaikCiltBakimSerum;
